The '''Kraken''' is a giant squid-like creature that appears in the ''[[Minecraft Mini-Series]]''.

== Appearance ==
The Kraken looks similar to a Squid, but his shape of head are different, he has red eyes with angry eyebrows and is paler in color, and also has large mouth with a nether portal inside.

== Biography ==
In Episode 1, after Poseidon betrayed CommuniKate and trapped several of her friends in sand pillars, Quinn attempted to rescue them, but a kraken suddenly emerged from the depths and began chasing her to the bridge. In Episode 7, when Poseidon trapped the remaining participants in a sand pillar, the kraken began to break the pillar, but the heroes jumped off it and distracted the kraken by throwing fish far away.

== Power and Abilities ==
As shown in the series, the kraken is gigantic in size, can break several blocks at once with one blow of its tentacle and a portal through which it can send a mob to the nether.
